name: Protector (aitordsgn)
description:
This game is my first ever game. This game is my subsmission for the "Mini Jam 76". I  have loved doing this game. All the art and the music is done by me. It was a bit hard to achieve the look that I want in such few time, but I love  challenging miself. I will lovely receive your thougths and opinions.

The jam has a limitation that was the controls must be one handed thats why the controls are so weird.
